sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const Alphabet = () => { const alphabetThai = [ "ก", "ข", "ฃ", "ค", "ฅ", "ฆ", "ง", "จ", "ฉ", "ช", "ซ", "ฌ", "ญ", "ฎ", "ฏ", "ฐ", "ฑ", "ฒ", "ณ", "ด", "ต", "ถ", "ท", "ธ", "น", "บ", "ป", "ผ", "ฝ", "พ", "ฟ", "ภ", "ม", "ย", "ร", "ล", "ว", "ศ", "ษ", "ส", "ห", "ฬ", "อ", "ฮ", ]; const pronunciationThai = [ "ก ไก่", "ข ไข่", "ฃ ฃวด", "ค ควาย", "ค คน", "ฆ ระฆัง", "ง งู", "จ จาน", "ฉ ฉิ่ง", "ช ช้าง", "ซ โซ่", "ฌ เฌอ", "ญ หญิง", "ฎ ชฎา", "ฏ ปฏัก", "ฐ ฐาน", "ฑ นางมณโท", "ฒ ผู้เฒ่า", "ณ เณร", "ด เด็ก", "ต เต่า", "ถ ถุง", "ท ทหาร", "ธ ธง", "น หนู", "บ ใบไม่", "ป ปลา", "ผ ผื้ง", "ฝ ฝา", "พ พาน", "ฟ ฟัน", "ภ ส่าเภา", "ม มา", "ย ยักษ์", "ร เรือ", "ล ลิง", "ว เหวน", "ศ ศาลา", "ษ ฤาษี", "ส เสือ", "ห หีบ", "ฬ จุฬา", "อ อ่าง", "ฮ นกฮูก", ]; const pronunciationInter = [ "gho gai", "kho kai", "kho khuo", "kho kuai", "kho khon", "kho ra kang", "ngo ngu", "jo jaan", "cho ching", "cho chang", "sor so", "cho che", "yor ying", "dho cha da", "dltho patak", "tho taan", "thi nangmortho", "tho phu thao", "nho nae", "dho delk", "dltho dtao", "tho thoong", "tho tha han", "tho thong", "ngo nu", "bo bai mai", "bpo bpla", "pho phun", "fo fa", "pho pan", "fo fun", "pho sampao", "mo maa", "yo yak", "ro rue", "lo ling", "wo van", "so sala", "so reu si", "so sue", "ho hip", "lo zula", "all ang", "ho nok hook", ]; const vowel = ["", "", "", "", "", "", ""]; const vowelInter = []; return (
{alphabetThai.map((letter, index) => (
{letter}
{pronunciationThai[index]}
{pronunciationInter[index]}
))}
); }; export default Alphabet;
